title: Exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file fails
description:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Provide a name for the zip file (e.g. test.zip) 
4. Click on the 'Export' button to begin the export process to a zip file.

Observed Behavior: 
An error message box pops up displaying the following message: 'Problems were encountered during export' and the details mention a file with the same name in project2 as the problem.

Expected Behavior: 
All files with the same name from different directories should be exported to the zip file without any errors.

Steps to Reproduce: 
1. Open the 'Export' dialog window
2. Select both projects created earlier
3. Provide a name for the zip file (e.g. test.zip) 
4. Click on the 'Export' button to begin the export process to a zip file.
